dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noAccounts: No accounts yet. Create your first account!
dashboard.noTransactions: No transactions yet. Add your first transaction!

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
transactions.empty: No transactions yet. Add your first one to get started!
transactions.needTwoAccounts: You need at least two accounts to create a transaction.
transactions.convertDescription: This will convert the expense to an investment. The original transaction will be deleted and a new investment will be created.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.name: Name

accounts.empty: No accounts yet. Create your first account!

creditCards.name: Card Name
creditCards.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credit card?
creditCards.empty: No credit cards yet. Add your first credit card!

loans.title: Loans
loans.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this loan?
loans.empty: No loans yet. Add your first loan!

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.exportDescription: Export all your financial data including accounts, transactions, investments, loans, and transfers to an Excel spreadsheet.
exportData.includeAccounts: All accounts with balances and currencies
exportData.exportNote: The exported file will be downloaded to your device and can be opened with Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, or any compatible spreadsheet application.
exportData.importDescription: Import transactions from a bank statement. The system will analyze the document and extract transaction data.
exportData.previewDescription: Review the extracted transactions before importing them to the database.
exportData.noTransactionsFound: No transactions found in the document. Try the Import Records page for more options.
exportData.pdfParseError: Could not extract text from PDF. Try using the Import Records page which supports OCR for images.
exportData.recommendImportPage: For best results, use the Import Records page which supports more formats, OCR for images, and editing options.

importRecords.title: Import Records
importRecords.uploadDescription: Upload a file containing transaction data. The AI will analyze and extract the relevant information.
importRecords.aiDescription: Our AI system will analyze the file content and extract transaction data including dates, amounts, and descriptions.
importRecords.previewDescription: Review and edit the extracted transactions before importing. Click on any cell to edit its value.
importRecords.selectFileHint: Select a file to import transactions from CSV, XLSX, PDF, TXT, or image files.
importRecords.noTransactionsFound: No transactions could be extracted from the file
importRecords.selectAccounts: Please select both from and to accounts
importRecords.sameAccountError: From and To accounts must be different
importRecords.creditCardNoAccount: Credit card has no associated account
importRecords.dragDropHint: or drag and drop files here

investments.title: Investments
investments.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this investment?
investments.empty: No investments yet. Add your first investment!
investments.emptyAccounts: Please create an account first before adding investments.
investments.name: Name

accountTypes.checking: A regular checking account for daily transactions and bill payments
accountTypes.savings: A savings account for storing money and earning interest
accountTypes.creditCard: Credit card account to track your credit card spending and payments
accountTypes.cash: Physical cash you have on hand
accountTypes.investment: Investment accounts like stocks, bonds, or retirement accounts

expenseTypes.fixed: Regular recurring expenses that don't change much (rent, subscriptions, insurance)
expenseTypes.variable: Expenses that vary from month to month (groceries, entertainment, shopping)

tooltips.currency: Choose the currency for this account. All transactions will use this currency.
tooltips.paymentType: How you paid for this transaction (cash, credit card, debit card, etc.)
tooltips.recurring: Enable if this transaction repeats regularly (e.g., monthly subscription)
tooltips.category: Categorize your transaction for better organization and reporting
